item.description:
Hello all, 

I was thinking we have not had a road trip event in a while.

I was thinking Nomads Adenvture Quest
http://www.nomadsadventurequest.com/index.html in South Windsor
on Saturday Oct 1st. The place looks like a lot of fun. For a
ballpark figure probably plan on a $30 - $50 dollar night including dinner and games included. (depending on how you drink). Oct 1st gives us lots of time to plan for our calendars and save up for the event. Please RSVP early to give me an idea as to what to tell the Nomads mgmt and see what kind of deals can be worked out for the group. 

Don't forget to bring the $1.00 for Nina our awesome organizer to help pay for the meetup.

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: A night out at Nomads Adventure Quest
